name: The Right Contact
tag_list: contact-lenses, find-contact-lenses, hybrid-contact-lenses, button-materials, gas-permeable-lenses, scleral-contact-lenses, specialty-contact-lenses, contact-lens-forum, soft-contact-lenses, hard-contact-lenses
overview:
The Right Contact - Up to date information regarding contact lenses, Hyrid lenses, Soft lenses, button materials, gas permable lens and contact lens care products.

Developed by an optometrist in 2007, our website was designed to provide doctors, opticians and other contact lens professionals easily accessible, up to date information regarding contact lenses and contact lens care products. The site allows for simple, as well as detailed searches on multiple contact lens and contact lens solution parameters. Our database contains over 2000 products and is supported by over 150 manufacturers.

In an effort to supply the best product for our users, we are looking for your feedback during the pre-launch peroid of our website. Your responses could win you a free iPad 2. Register today!

The IPad2 giveaway is open to all registered users of TheRightContact.com and will run until March 1, 2012.  Winners will be selected by The Right Contact Team and will be chosen by the value of the feedback given to the online questionaire.
